nodes.caption:
TRANSFORMATION TIME 😱 LEFT 👉🏽(September 2015)lifting weights 5-6x a week, uneducated on nutrition I was "gluten free", 0 cardio ever, unhappy with my image. RIGHT👉🏽(May 2017) lifting 6x a week, 30 min of HIIT cardio post lift 6x a week, macro counting everyday/ eating candy, pizza  when i want it and still hitting my macro goals. Using My Fitness Pal app to track what I eat everyday to continue to be in a 'cut'. Not binging on bad foods, not restricting myself or feeling guilty if I have a piece of candy! Learning balance and LOVING it! I've been craving balance for so long! And I am so happy to say I finally figured it out 👍🏽 this is about a 13lb difference. Although I am not fixated on the number on the scale because 1. I am lifting and as we all know muscle weighs more than fat, 2. Your body weight changes with in a few pounds constantly due to water retention, hormones, etc.. 3. The number on the scale doesn't define me nor does it control my happiness! I don't care how much I weigh. I have no "goal weight" I just want to be my best self and love myself and my body! And for the first time in my life I can say I have found my happy place ☺️ if any men/women are struggling with finding balance with health & fitness please contact me! I would love for anybody struggling like I was to be where I'm at now! 
#happylifting #newme #transformation #transformationpicture #fitness #fitnessjunky #healthylifestyle #healthylifestyle #notadietbutalifestyle #iifym #macro #macrocounting #macrogirl #balance #npc #bodybuilding #loveyourself #l8rlifestyle #newmewhodis

Já fazem 2 meses que não posto aqui, o que não significa que parei o meu processo.  Estou terminando meu quarto mês de tratamento amanhã e por isso quero registrar os resultados do mês passado.  Tenho vivido meses de muito aprendizado e uma batalha constante contra a compulsão alimentar, é muito difícil se controlar o tempo todo, mas manter-se longe da comida e das tentações me dão muito mais clareza para continuar esse processo.  Nesse processo eu descobri que perder peso é muito mais fácil do que mudar a atitude.  Várias pessoas me perguntaram do processo e da clinica que eu frequento, vale a pena entrar no instagram deles e no site @institutoterapeuticopaulobuosi 
_______

I didn’t post anything in the last 2 months, but it doesn’t mean that I stopped my treatment.  I’m finishing my forth month of treatment tomorrow this is why I’m registering my results from last month.  I’ve been learning so much with my process and I’m in a constant battle against my binge eating, it’s hard to keep the control everytime but when I’m far from food and temptations my mind helps me to keep pushing up.  In my process I learned that is easier loose fat than change your own atitude.  So many people asked me about my treatment and about the clinic, so here it comes their instagram profile  @institutoterapeuticopaulobuosi 
#healthylife #equilibrio #saúde #nutrição #comidasaudavel #beleza #corpo #mente #espírito #objetivos #obesidade #respeito #metas #funcional  #saude #sport #eatclean #healthy  #healthlife #goals #balance #obesity #nutrition #fat2fit #fattofit #fightingtheobesity

Today's #RhythmicRx is #Justice and we lead into this playlist with a quote from Mark Twain.  The quote seemed particularly appropriate given the political turmoil America finds itself embroiled in.  Enjoy the vibrations, ride the vibrations and make sure your voice is heard in these times of #love and chaos.  Rock out Speak out! ✌🏼✌🏾 #TelleInk #OneDay1Change #HearNoEvilMusicProject

hearNOevil #music project is about acknowledging the power and influence of music in our everyday lives across the world. In these times of love and chaos, what are the answers to a world that seems to be spinning out of control?  @oneday1change X @telleink will create a playlist daily that resonates with the times spreading positive vibes and staying away from violent and degrading lyrics. It's our "Rhythmic Prescription" to heal the world one playlist at a time. The lists will be available to stream or download on both @applemusic and @tidal to ensure everyone with a subscription access. #LOVE loud SEEK #balance CELEBRATE #diversity and let your freak flag fly!  One love!  #Positivevibes The link to the playlist on Apple Music will be found daily @oneday1change bio - the link to the Tidal Music playlist will be found daily on @telleink IG also under her website. #nickgrant #sirthebaptist #mø #kendricklamar #aliciakeys #chace #mattynoyes #florenceandthemachine #jcole #allankingdom #puffdaddy #faithevans @nmemagazine @spinmagazine @rollingstone @arresteddevelopment__ @zanelowe

Keseimbangan yang baik dapat mengurangi resiko cedera❓Kenapa⁉️Keseimbangan adalah hal yang mutlak perlu dimiliki oleh seorang atlet⚽️. Karena dengan memiliki keseimbangan yang baik, atlet dapat menggunakan kekuatan dan tenaganya🏋secara efektif sehingga tidak cepat mengalami kelelahan💦. Jika seorang atlet cepat lelah konsentrasi pun akan menurun secara drastis⬇️ dan membuat resiko mengalami cedera dapat meningkat⬆️.
Pict from: @galamedianews 🙏
